actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East

official_title: A concurrent resolution urging President Reagan and General Secretary Gorbachev to act to prevent the forces of global politics from adversely affecting the 1988 Summer Olympic Games in Seoul, South Korea and the 1988 Winter Olympic Games in Calgary, Canada.

summary.text: Urges President Reagan and General Secretary Gorbachev to act to prevent global politics from adversely affecting the 1988 Summer Olympic Games in Seoul, South Korea, and the Winter Olympic Games in Calgary, Canada.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution urging President Reagan and General Secretary Gorbachev to act to prevent the forces of global politics from adversely affecting the 1988 Summer Olympic Games in Seoul, South Korea and the 1988 Winter Olympic Games in Calgary, Canada.
